mapper.select: select date_format(endTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')as endTime ,mu.userName,mu.userId,mu.phoneNumber,mu.postId, mp.pname as postName from mayuser mu,maypost mp where mu.postId = mp.pid limit #{start},#{rows} date_formatter(engTime,"yyyy-MM-dd%Y")
mapper.update: update mayuser mu set mu.userName=#{userName},mu.phoneNumber=#{phoneNumber},mu.postId=#{postId},mu.userPassword=#{userPassword} where mu.uid=#{uid}
mapper.select: select mu.* from mayuser mu,mayrenter mr where mu.shouId=mr.rid and mu.userId = #{value}
select mu.* from mayuser mu,maylandlord ml where mu.shouId=ml.lid and mu.userId = #{value}
